Topic.Title: 'Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request.'

Posts.EditableText: I cannot create Quest nor Text Adventure games online. I can edit and play the ones I had, but not create new ones.
Posts.HTML: I cannot create Quest nor Text Adventure games online. I can edit and play the ones I had, but not create new ones.

Posts.EditableText: yeah, I'm brand-new here so I wasn't sure if it was just me.
Posts.HTML: yeah, I'm brand-new here so I wasn't sure if it was just me.

Posts.EditableText: If it's just creating games that's a problem, try changing `http://` in the address to `https://`.
Posts.HTML: If it's just creating games that's a problem, try changing http:// in the address to https://.
